Dear Mr. Skaraiai
Thanks for your letter of August 12, 1953, very
kindly inviting m to attend the 1953 Annual Convention

Win you please convey ny appreciation to your Executive
Committee and to Mr* Dunn, the host of the convention*
I rather hope that I may be able to attend, hut that
necessarily will depend on sense other pending ccw&taents,
so that I cannot be sure at this tine that I can cam.

present.
Yours sincerely.
(Signed) John Marshall
